mapper.insert: insert into op_taxiorder(orderno, companyid, userid, passengers, passengerphone, oncity, onaddress, offcity, offaddress, onaddrlng, onaddrlat, offaddrlng, offaddrlat, usetime, tripremark, orderstatus, paymentstatus, reviewstatus, estimatedtime, estimatedmileage, estimatedcost, pricecopy, ordersource, userhidden, status, schedulefee, paymentmethod, ordersortcolumn, undertime, createtime, updatetime, isusenow, meterrange, systemsendovertime, autocanceltime, usetype, ordertype, belongleasecompany,thirdorderno) values(#{orderno}, #{companyid}, #{userid}, #{passengers}, #{passengerphone}, #{oncity}, #{onaddress}, #{offcity}, #{offaddress}, #{onaddrlng}, #{onaddrlat}, #{offaddrlng}, #{offaddrlat}, #{usetime}, #{tripremark}, #{orderstatus}, #{paymentstatus}, #{reviewstatus}, #{estimatedtime}, #{estimatedmileage}, #{estimatedcost}, #{pricecopy}, #{ordersource}, #{userhidden}, #{status}, #{schedulefee}, #{paymentmethod}, #{ordersortcolumn}, #{undertime}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{isusenow}, #{meterrange}, #{systemsendovertime}, #{autocanceltime}, #{usetype}, #{ordertype},#{belongleasecompany} ,#{thirdorderno})
